titleStmt.title: The liberty of prayer asserted, and garded [sic] from licentiousness by a minister of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Jenks, Benjamin, 1646-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Roberts, and are to be sold by the Booksellers in London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Benjamin Jenks. cf. NUC pre-1956.
"The liberty of prayer, guarded from licentiousness" has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
